revision.text: '''Hoenn''' is the third [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokedex for this region contains 138 Pokemon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating round 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]]. '''Hoenn''' is the third [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokedex for this region contains 138 Pokemon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating round 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]]. '''Hoenn''' is the third [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokedex for this region contains 138 Pokemon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating round 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]]. '''Hoenn''' is the third [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokedex for this region contains 138 Pokemon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating round 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]]. '''Hoenn''' is the third [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokedex for this region contains 138 Pokemon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating round 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]]. '''Hoenn''' is the third [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokedex for this region contains 138 Pokemon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating round 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]]. '''Hoenn''' is the third [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokedex for this region contains 138 Pokemon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating round 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]].
